original: HYLKEMA, Rinse Synes Hylke, Direktör, Norrköping, f Utrecht, Holl, 15/12 06, gm Joke Dekker. Gymn o tekn högsk i Delft. Anst Braat stålfönsterfabr, Delft, 28—33, Phi-lipskonc, Eindhoven, 33—iO, vkst dir Nrkpgs El.tekn Fabr AB (NEFA) sed. 40, styr.led där. Holl repr i Int El.techn Comm (IEC), radiosakk i Installations Frage Kommiss (IFK). Resor: Europa o Ind. Holl medb.
translated: HYLKEMA, Rinse Synes Hylke, Director, Norrköping, born in Utrecht, Holland, on 15/12 1906, married to Joke Dekker. Educated at the gymnasium and technical university in Delft. Employed at Braat Steel Window Factory in Delft from 1928 to 1933, then at Philips in Eindhoven from 1933 to 1940. Became the managing director of Norrköping Electrical Technology Factory AB (NEFA) in 1940 and served on the board of directors there. Represented Holland in the International Electrical Technology Commission (IEC) and was a radio consultant on the Installation Question Commission (IFK). Traveled extensively in Europe and India. Holland citizen.
